name: Starlight (itch) (Trianull)
description:
A simple yet polished platformer game, maneuver across six worlds as you chase down an evil dark mass.

Supported controls: Arrow Keys and WASD, plus Space, Z, or X to jump/select. Enter, Backspace, and Esc are also available menu inputs.

Left/Right Arrows + P to skip backwards/forwards a level, Up/Down Arrows + P to restart a level.

Made in Scratch 3 and packaged with TurboWarp.

Music remixed from Wynncraft.
